title: A Kingdom of Ruin
description: Never sell your soul to the Demon King.Too late.In an effort to save all that I love, I have to finish the job Nyfain startedâ€¦ and ruin myself.I've made a trade with the most cunning creature alive.Me for them.The dungeons will be my new home. Dolion's destruction will be my new goal.I just have to get out of here and back to my golden dragon. Preferably alive.
author: K.F. Breene
